ygData.subject: HTTP DELETE Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Could HTTP DELETE carry a body? I didn t see a mention of this in RFC2616. If it s not allowed, how would you perform DELETE on multiple resources?As  ;

Could HTTP DELETE carry a body? I didn't see a mention of this in
RFC2616. =
If it's not allowed, how would you perform DELETE on multiple
resources?As =
 ";" separated params? If the DELETE request can carry a
body, we can speci=
fy the individual resources in the body itself. 

Thanks,
